snippet.title: Tea For Two: A Detective Logan's Case - Playthrough (point and click mystery game)
snippet.description:
-- Tea For Two: A Detective Logan's Case - Playthrough (point and click mystery game) --
Investigate the death of a mysterious woman in this point and click game. Made for Adventure Jam 2019! 

The web version is a bit experimental, may fail to load if the network has too much latency. On desktop, use alt+enter to play it in Fullscreen.

Headphones recommended. The game is short.

https://eri0o.itch.io/tea-for-two-a-detective-logans-case
https://jams.gamejolt.io/advjam2019/games/teafortwo/421342

Updated         2 days ago
Published 11 days ago
Status         Released
Platforms Windows, Linux, HTML5
Release date Jun 27, 2019
Author         eri0o
Genre         Adventure
Made with Adventure Game Studio
Tags         2D, Point & Click, Short, Story Rich
Average session A few minutes
Languages English
Inputs         Mouse

-- Tea For Two: A Detective Logan's Case - Playthrough (point and click mystery game) --
